title: Douglas C. Mackay Award for Excellence in Money Management
preview: This week, I received the Douglas C. Mackay Award for Excellence in Money Management, and it was a great way to cap off the Portfolio and Money Management course.
fullText:
This week, I received the Douglas C. Mackay Award for Excellence in Money Management, and it was a great way to cap off the Portfolio and Money Management course.

The course covered advanced portfolio theory, including modern portfolio optimization, risk-return analysis, asset allocation strategies, and sophisticated money management techniques. We explored concepts such as the Capital Asset Pricing Model (CAPM), efficient frontier analysis, diversification strategies, and dynamic hedging techniques used by institutional investors.
